title: Update Makefile for new flake location
description: Change FLAKE := ./home-manager to FLAKE := . in Makefile. Update cd commands and paths.

title: Move modules/ directory to repo root
description: Move home-manager/modules/ to ./modules/. Contains packages, programs, services, file, sessionpath, sessionvariables. Update import paths in home.nix.

title: Move home-manager to repo root - Epic
Remove empty home-manager directory
description: After migration, delete the now-empty home-manager/ directory and its README.md.

title: Move platforms/ directory to repo root
description: Move home-manager/platforms/ to ./platforms/. Contains darwin/ and linux/ platform-specific configs. Update references in flake.nix.

title: Move home.nix to repo root
description: Move home-manager/home.nix to ./home.nix. Update import paths in flake.nix.

title: Move flake.nix and flake.lock to repo root
description: Move home-manager/flake.nix to ./flake.nix and flake.lock accordingly. This makes the repo a proper Nix flake at root level.

title: Move hosts/ directory to repo root
description: Move home-manager/hosts/ to ./hosts/. Contains mac-machine, nixos, zomarchy configs. Update all references in flake.nix.

title: Validate with make check
description: Run make check to validate the flake after migration. Ensure all hosts build correctly.

title: Update AGENTS.md documentation
description: Update architecture section to reflect new structure without home-manager subdirectory.
